topic.title: Wisconsinites
topic.body:
I really REALLY hate people from Wisconsin. I don't even consider them a real race. If you are from Wisconsin please don't come anywhere near me, I will not acknowledge you if you try to talk to me. When I see someone with Wisconsin license plates I want to slash their tires. I hope the great lakes flood and drown the whole state. Wisconsin and the people who live there are repulsive subhuman garbage. If the whole state were to get annexed and become a part of Ontario it would actually be an overall improvement.

I really hope I'm not alone in my hatred of Wisconsinites...
